wikipedia_page.main: Lillian Chalmers (born 5 December 1911, date of death unknown) was an English athlete who competed in the 1934 British Empire Games. At the 1934 Empire Games she won the bronze medal in the 100 yards event. She also competed in the 1938 European Championships in Athletics held in Vienna and finished sixth in the 200 metre event.
